original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1161)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4431)@</color> 秒內提升我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4431)@</color> 點武力和智力以及 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4431)@</color> 點移動速度，同時提升我方全體士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4436)@</color> 點武力 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4436)@</color> 點移動速度，若士兵內有騎兵的話則額外提升 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4451)@</color> 點武力 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4451)@</color> 點移動速度，且 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 秒為間隔以  <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(876)@ x2</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>隨機對敵方武將周圍造成 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 次物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1161)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4431)@</color> seconds Improve all our generals' <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4431)@</color> point of strength and intelligence and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4431)@</color> point of movement speed, and at the same time improve our side All soldiers <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4436)@</color> Point of force <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4436)@</color> Point of movement speed, if there are cavalry in the soldier, it will be increased.<color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4451)@</color> Point of force <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4451)@</color> Point of movement speed, and <color=#ccffcc>4</color> Seconds For the interval, <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(876)@x2</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> randomly caused <color=#ccffcc>4</color> times around the enemy generals Physical damage.
